description: FlaskPyrezAPI is an open-source endpoint for Twitch commands that provides datas about players, matches and others stats of Paladins game.

PYREZ_AUTH_ID.description: Used for authentication. This is the authentication key that you receive from Hi-Rez Studios.

PYREZ_DEV_ID.description: Used for authentication. This is the developer ID that you receive from Hi-Rez Studios.

name: FlaskPyrezAPI
